metadata.feature_description: Display posts in different view modes including list, detail, and card views

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Posts displayed in card view layout
steps.actual: Posts displayed in card grid with 3 columns, showing post titles, summaries, dates, and author names

steps.action: Click on a post card to view detail
steps.expected: Post detail page displays with full content and metadata
steps.actual: Detail view shows breadcrumb navigation, post title (H1), published date, tags with links, full body content, author info with avatar, and social sharing buttons

steps.action: Examine list view cards for metadata
steps.expected: Cards show title, summary, date, and author
steps.actual: Each card displays: post title, truncated summary, 'Posted on [date] by' text, and author display name
Detail view shows: breadcrumb (News > Post Title), full title as H1, date (February 9, 2026), tags with filter links, post body, author section with avatar and 'More from this author' link

steps.action: Navigate to News page with tag filter (?tags=technology)
steps.expected: Only posts with the technology tag are displayed
steps.actual: Filtered view shows 2 posts with 'technology' tag. 'Viewing: technology x' indicator displayed with remove option. Breadcrumb shows 'NEWS > Search Results'

steps.action: Navigate to News page with author filter (?author=1)
steps.expected: Only posts by the specified author are displayed
steps.actual: Filtered view shows 8 posts by SuperUser Account. 'Viewing: SuperUser Account x' indicator displayed. Cards show all posts by this author in grid layout

steps.expected: Card layout adapts to mobile view
steps.actual: Mobile view displays cards in single-column layout. Menu collapses to hamburger icon. Search bar is full-width. Cards stack vertically with consistent styling

steps.action: Navigate to post detail and examine page metadata
steps.expected: SEO metadata is correctly set including title, description, Open Graph tags
steps.actual: Page title set to post title ('First Test Post About Technology'). Meta description contains post summary. Open Graph tags present: og:title, og:description, og:type (article), og:image (site logo), og:url (canonical URL). Canonical link tag present

steps.action: Review list view for pagination functionality
steps.expected: Load More button appears when posts exceed page size
steps.actual: With 8 posts displayed in author-filtered view, all posts are shown. Code review confirms CardViewManager.js implements loadMore() functionality with startIndex/endIndex pagination. Load More link shown when data.length equals pageSize

observations: Code review shows List.ascx uses 'small-card' CSS class for card styling in list view
Featured.ascx provides both desktop-card and mobile-card views for featured posts section
CardViewManager.js handles infinite scroll/load more with AJAX requests to ViewPost/Search endpoint
Detail.ascx displays full post with author profile info including city, website, and biography when available
Tags are clickable links that filter posts via URL query parameter (?tags=tagname)
OpenGraph.SetPageMetaAndOpenGraph method in List.ascx.cs handles SEO metadata generation
Disqus comments integration is available but requires configuration via Connectors
Empty state message 'EmptyTitle' and 'EmptySubtitle' displayed when no posts exist (per code review of List.ascx)
Touch events handled for mobile card interaction with touchStart/touchEnd in CardViewManager.js
